function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Restricted data collection due to social distancing requirements","Impact":"Limited scope of data collection, potential bias in the study results","Mitigation":"Include a diversity of data sources from different geographic locations","Technologies":"Online data collection tools, remote sensing technologies","People":"Researchers, authors of the study","Owner":"Research team, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Close proximity of residential and commercial areas","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases between residents and customers","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation and hygiene protocols, promote vaccination and mask-wearing","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection systems, contactless payment systems","People":"Residents, customers, employees","Owner":"Business owners, local government, health authorities"},{"Description":"Use of different sign types (informal vs. professional)","Impact":"Potential for informal signs to convey misinformation or lack important health-related messages","Mitigation":"Standardize sign content and design guidelines, provide clear guidelines for sign placement","Technologies":"Digital signage systems, automated content management systems","People":"Residents, customers, employees","Owner":"Local government, business owners"}]}
